data.text: @ncdhhs No, the gig (hoax’ is over now) . And the fake media nobody has ever believed anyway. The hospitals are not full of Covid people & the deaths are not Covid related. We’re not being ‘played’ any longer.. we’re burning all masks

@ncdhhs Hi @NCDHHS .. thanks for all the good data sharing! How about collecting data on long Covid/ PASC? You could set up a portal for self reporting, with symptom checklist with rating scale of severity, and how long affected- resolved or ongoing.

@Winterfield11 @ncdhhs I'm sure some medical professionals are done with this charade. You spend your days ingesting this nonsense and fake numbers? The decrease in cases is only because the powers that be that list the numbers know there's an election in November and Dems need to look good.
@Shumster_2 @ncdhhs I care. I look up the statistics daily. I give Covid treatments and am encouraged by the decrease in cases. I'm sure other medical professionals feel the same
@ncdhhs Do you just reuse the same tweet daily as the number hasn’t changed in months??
@ncdhhs The plandemic is over. This nonsense isn't something to report on every day. Does anyone care about the numbers anymore? It's time to move on and find something worthwhile to talk about.

February 25, 2022 COVID-19 NC Vaccine Update:
71% Adult Population Vaccinated with Two Doses or One Dose J&J
75% Adult Population Vaccinated with at Least One Dose
